meanings.definition: A person who keeps records or accounts.
meanings.sent1: The recorders at the company meticulously track all expenses.
meanings.sent2: The recorders in the accounting department are responsible for maintaining financial records.
meanings.sent3: The recorders at the office always have their calculators ready for number-crunching.
meanings.sent4: She was like a human recorder, remembering every detail of the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The recorders in the team are like memory wizards, never forgetting any important information.

meanings.definition: A device for recording sound or images.
meanings.sent1: The recorders captured the beautiful sounds of nature in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a new recorder to document my music compositions.
meanings.sent3: The recorder decided to take a break after a long day of capturing voices.
meanings.sent4: Her camera was her trusty recorder, preserving memories for years to come.
meanings.sent5: The recorder in the studio faithfully stored every note played by the musician.

meanings.sent2: The recorder's sweet melody filled the room during the music class.
meanings.sent3: The recorder in the band was known for its high-pitched tunes.
